summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; authorizing preparation of plans, specifications and cost estimates for installation of Hi-Dro Cushion Impact attenuation devices at Boylston Avenue East and East Newton Street, Alaskan Way at Seneca Street, Admiral Way at Southwest Spokane Street, and First Avenue South at South Michigan Street in the Hi-Dro Cushions III Program, and making a partially reimbursable appropriation from the Arterial City Street Fund therefor.
